languages.text: "А здесь, за стеклянной стеной, тоскует по брату дщерь, отринутая отцом. И бледный солнечный диск следит неустанно... За ней? Нет, за мной. Его ледяные лучи лгут о наставшей весне. Мертвен свет. Владыка Великий... НЕТ!"

traits.locale_text: "А здесь, за стеклянной стеной, тоскует по брату дщерь, отринутая отцом. И бледный солнечный диск следит неустанно... За ней? Нет, за мной. Его ледяные лучи лгут о наставшей весне. Мертвен свет. Владыка Великий... НЕТ!"

languages.text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"
languages.original_text: "А здесь, за стеклянной стеной, тоскует по брату дщерь, отринутая отцом. И бледный солнечный диск следит неустанно... За ней? Нет, за мной. Его ледяные лучи лгут о наставшей весне. Мертвен свет. Владыка Великий... НЕТ!"

"And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

"And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

"And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

languages.text: “在这里，玻璃幕墙之外，被父亲抛弃的女儿渴望着她的兄弟。太阳苍白的圆盘，不知疲惫地追求着……她？不，是我。它冰冷的光线，谎称春天已经到来。光芒已然熄灭，伟大的统治者……消失了！”
languages.original_text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

traits.locale_text: “在这里，玻璃幕墙之外，被父亲抛弃的女儿渴望着她的兄弟。太阳苍白的圆盘，不知疲惫地追求着……她？不，是我。它冰冷的光线，谎称春天已经到来。光芒已然熄灭，伟大的统治者……消失了！”

languages.text: 「そしてここ、ガラスの壁の向こうでは、父に見捨てられた娘が兄弟を慕っているのです。そして、太陽の青白い円盤は、たゆまぬ探求を続ける…探しているのは彼女？いいえ、それはあたくし。その凍てついた光線は、春が来たことを偽る。光は枯れ果てた。そして偉大なる支配者は…死んだのです！」
languages.original_text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

traits.locale_text: 「そしてここ、ガラスの壁の向こうでは、父に見捨てられた娘が兄弟を慕っている。そして、太陽の青白い円盤は、たゆまぬ探求を続ける…彼女を？いいえ、私を。その凍てついた光線は、春が来たことを偽る。光は枯れ果てた。そして偉大なる支配者は…死んだのだ！」
「そしてここ、ガラスの壁の向こうでは、父に見捨てられた娘が兄弟を慕っているのです。そして、太陽の青白い円盤は、たゆまぬ探求を続ける…探しているのは彼女？いいえ、それはあたくし。その凍てついた光線は、春が来たことを偽る。光は枯れ果てた。そして偉大なる支配者は…死んだのです！」

languages.text: "Und hier, jenseits der Wand aus Glas, sehnt sich eine Tochter, verlassen von ihrem Vater, nach ihrem Bruder. Und die fahle Scheibe der Sonne macht sich ruhelos an die Verfolgung. Von ihr? Nein. Von mir. Ihre gefrorenen Strahlen lügen, der Frühling käme. Das Licht stirbt. Der Große Herrscher ist ... FORT!"
languages.original_text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

traits.locale_text: "Und hier, jenseits der Wand aus Glas, sehnt sich eine Tochter, verlassen von ihrem Vater, nach ihrem Bruder. Und die fahle Scheibe der Sonne macht sich ruhelos an die Verfolgung. Von ihr? Nein. Von mir. Ihre gefrorenen Strahlen lügen, der Frühling käme. Das Licht stirbt. Der Große Herrscher ist ... FORT!"

languages.text: « Et là, derrière le mur de verre, une fille abandonnée par son père se languit de son frère. Et le disque pâle du soleil poursuit inlassablement sa course... vers elle ? Non. Vers moi. Ses rayons gelés annoncent l'arrivée du printemps. La lumière n'est plus. Le Souverain... N'EST PLUS ! »
languages.original_text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

traits.locale_text: « Et là, derrière le mur de verre, une fille abandonnée par son père se languit de son frère. Et le disque pâle du soleil poursuit inlassablement sa course... vers elle ? Non. Vers moi. Ses rayons gelés annoncent l'arrivée du printemps. La lumière n'est plus. Le Souverain... N'EST PLUS ! »

languages.text: «Y aquí, al otro lado del muro de cristal, una hija abandonada por su padre añora a su hermano. Y el disco pálido del sol parte para perseguir incansable... ¿a ella? No. A mí. Sus rayos helados urden la mentira de la llegada de la primavera. La luz está sofocada. El gran gobernante... ¡NO ESTÁ!».
languages.original_text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

Sus rayos helados urden la mentira de la llegada de la primavera. La luz está sofocada. El gran gobernante... ¡NO ESTÁ!».

languages.text: "Burada, camdan duvarın ötesinde, babasının terk ettiği bir kız, erkek kardeşini özlüyor. Güneşin solgun diski dur durak dinlemeden... Kızı mı kovalıyor? Hayır. Beni. Donmuş ışınları bahar geldi diye yalan söylüyor. Işık körelmiş. Ulu Hükümdar... ARTIK YOK!"
languages.original_text: "And here, beyond the wall of glass, a daughter forsaken by her father yearns for her brother. And the sun's pale disk goes in tireless pursuit... of her? No. Of me. Its frozen rays lie that spring is here. The light is deadened. The Great Ruler is... GONE!"

traits.locale_text: "Burada, camdan duvarın ötesinde, babasının terk ettiği bir kız, erkek kardeşini özlüyor. Güneşin solgun diski dur durak dinlemeden... Kızı mı kovalıyor? Hayır. Beni. Donmuş ışınları bahar geldi diye yalan söylüyor. Işık körelmiş. Ulu Hükümdar... ARTIK YOK!"
